Package GraphView

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VertexPlacementStrategy
    Interface describing a Strategy Pattern method to lay out vertices on a GraphPanel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arrow
    Class that represents an arrow attached to a CubicCurve.
    CircularPlacementStrategy
    Strategy that places the vertices within a circle.
    CircularSortedPlacementStrategy
    Strategy that places the vertices within a circle, guaranteeing that the vertices are placed alphabetically ordered by their element().toString().
    GraphEdge
    A draggable graph edge representation in the form of a cubic curve (b-spline).
    GraphPanel<V,E>
    JavaFX pane that is capable of plotting a Graph ADT.
    GraphVertex
    A draggable graph vertex representation in the form of a circle.
    RandomPlacementStrategy
    Strategy that randomly places the vertices within the allowed bounds.
    UtilitiesPoint2D
    Class with utility methods for Point2D instances.
